explains: n. 空虚；空，无；空地；不真诚

sentences.en: The emptiness here sent shivers down my spine.
sentences.cn: 这里的空寂让我感到脊背一阵颤栗。

sentences.en: The passing of time brought a sense of emptiness.
sentences.cn: 时光的流逝带来了空虚的感觉。

sentences.en: The silence and emptiness of the house did not scare her.
sentences.cn: 房子的空寂并未使她感到害怕。
